moves.name: Tackle
moves.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Copycat
moves.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Psybeam
moves.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. It may also cause confusion.

moves.name: Hypnosis
moves.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Dizzy Punch
moves.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches that may also leave it confused.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Teeter Dance
moves.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the Pokémon around it.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

moves.name: Flail
moves.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. It becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
